name: Security Force Rappa Chiyomaru
text: Monsters your opponent controls that face a "Security Force" monster you control cannot target monsters for attacks, except a monster in their column. (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Security Force" card from your hand; return this card to the hand, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Security Force" monster from your Deck in Defense Position, except "Security Force Rappa Chiyomaru". You can only use this effect of "Security Force Rappa Chiyomaru" once per turn.
